body: Alright so, Avicus updated, and don't get me wrong this is a great update. But you (By you I mean a developer) said that we will add "tnt" to maps, which means tnt cannons. But how will you make tnt cannons workble now in 1.8? I know OCNs developers will try to fix it. Will this server do that aswell?

title: Tnt Cannons

replies.body:
i hope so but there are possibilities for tnt cannons to work that i have tested out myself in the hopes of something good happening...

I sincerely hope that something can be done with TNT but it is well and truly screwed around with

-banway
